token.description: The Discord bot token. Defined in https://discordapp.com/developers/applications/me/, under APP BOT USER/Token

can_delete.description: Allow to delete the bot's message with !s clean-messages

allow_mumble.description: Replace every broken people's message by a mumble.

mumble_should_edit.description: Do not set to true ! If Discord ever allows to edit other's messages, this will do exactly that.
